name: Ch.10ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Gilliam;Good morning, Kyle.|Here for guard duty?
speak;Kyle;Correct.|Looks like we're both on guard duty this morning.
speak;Gilliam;Good to have you.|By the way, your armor looks rather shiny today.
speak;Kyle;Yeah, I had extra time to polish my armor this morning.|Your armor is looking quite shiny as well.
speak;Gilliam;Thank you.|I take pride in my armor.|I make sure it's good to go in any occasion.

speak;Kyle;That's very admirable, Gilliam.|Say, what do you do to try to mitigate magical attacks?|I have a hard time dealing with those, truthfully.|Even the most pristine armor doesn't do much against spells...
speak;Gilliam;I'll be honest, Kyle...|I have a hard time against magical attacks as well.
speak;Kyle;I see...|Maybe we can see if Lute can teach us anything?
speak;Gilliam;Hmm...|Yeah, she might be able to help.
speak;Kyle;Wait one minute.|I'll go get her.
speak;Lute;You two want to know how to resist the arcane?
speak;Gilliam;...Well, we want to resist magic attacks.|Anything that you could teach us would be very helpful.

speak;Lute;That's what I... Nevermind.|I have been wanting to test something recently...|Yes, it could work!|If one is shocked by the magical tentacles of a Mogall enough, then surely...|Wait right there, you two. I will retrieve them.
speak;Kyle;I think this may have been a mistake.
alert;Gilliam and Kyle's RES growths have increased by 15!
